alert.note: Alert for Bastrop; Caldwell; Hays; Travis (Texas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued March 16 at 9:56PM CDT until March 16 at 10:45PM CDT by NWS Austin-San Antonio
info.description: ...A SEVERE THUNDERSTORM WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 1045 PM CDT FOR NORTHWESTERN CALDWELL...EAST CENTRAL HAYS...SOUTH CENTRAL TRAVIS AND SOUTHWESTERN BASTROP COUNTIES... At 955 PM CDT, a severe thunderstorm was located near Mustang Ridge, or near Austin Bergstrom Int Airport, moving southeast at 20 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts and nickel size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Expect damage to roofs, siding, and trees. Locations impacted include... Austin, Kyle, Buda, Lockhart, Austin Bergstrom Int Airport, Uhland, Mustang Ridge, Niederwald, Onion Creek, Cedar Creek, Mountain City, Creedmoor, Rockne, Watterson, Maha, Pilot Knob, Red Rock, Lytton Springs, Dale and Bateman. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...0.88 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
